summary: State and local crime labs analyze DNA evidence from crime scenes to help bring criminals to justice. At the end of 2017, these labs had about 169,000 backlogged requests for DNA analysis. While labs are doing more work, requests have increased in part because scientific advancements have made DNA analysis more useful. Also, thousands of sexual assault kits haven't even been submitted to crime labs...
title: DNA Evidence: DOJ Should Improve Performance Measurement and Properly Design Controls for Nationwide Grant Program
